alert.note: Alert for Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 4:39AM CST until February 16 at 5:30AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Weakley County in west Tennessee... Henry County in west Tennessee... * Until 530 AM CST. * At 438 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paris, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Cottage Grove, Routon, Puryear, Henry, Jones Mill, Foundry Hill, Crossland, Como, Buchanan, India, Mill Creek, Osage, Sunnyside, Whitlock, Porter Court, Conyersville, Pine Hill and Big Sandy Unit Tennessee National Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for west Tennessee.
